law.catch_line: Motor vehicles; minimum head lamp requirement.

text.section:
Sec. 30-319. Motor vehicles; minimum head lamp requirement.
Any motor vehicle may be operated at nighttime under the conditions specified in Sections and, when equipped with two (2) lighted lamps upon the front thereof capable of revealing persons and objects one hundred (100) feet ahead in lieu of maps required in Sections and; provided, that at no time when lighted lamps are required shall such motor vehicle be operated in excess of twenty (20) miles per hour.
